trans-unit.source: Authentication credentials could not be found.
trans-unit.target: Ni ellid dod o hyd i ddogfennau dilysu.

trans-unit.source: Authentication request could not be processed due to a system problem.
trans-unit.target: Ni ellid prosesu cais dilysu oherwydd problem gyda'r system.

trans-unit.source: Cookie has already been used by someone else.
trans-unit.target: Mae rhywun arall eisoes wedi defnyddio'r cwcis.

trans-unit.source: Not privileged to request the resource.
trans-unit.target: Heb y fraint i ofyn am yr adnodd.

trans-unit.source: No authentication provider found to support the authentication token.
trans-unit.target: Heb ddod o hyd i ddarparwr dilysu i gefnogi'r tocyn dilysu.

trans-unit.source: No session available, it either timed out or cookies are not enabled.
trans-unit.target: Dim sesiwn ar gael, naill ai mae wedi dod i ben neu nid yw cwcis wedi'u galluogi.
Heb ddod o hyd i docyn.
Heb ddod o hyd i enw defnyddiwr.
Mae'r cyfrif wedi dod i ben.
Mae'r dogfennau wedi dod i ben.

trans-unit.source: Too many failed login attempts, please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Gormod o ymdrechion mewngofnodi wedi methu, ceisiwch eto'n hwyrach.
Dolen mewngofnodi annilys neu wedi dod i ben.

trans-unit.source: Too many failed login attempts, please try again in %minutes% minute.
trans-unit.target: Gormod o ymdrechion mewngofnodi wedi methu, ceisiwch eto ymhen %minutes% munud.

trans-unit.source: Too many failed login attempts, please try again in %minutes% minutes.
trans-unit.target: Gormod o ymdrechion mewngofnodi wedi methu, rhowch gynnig arall arni mewn %minutes% munud.|Gormod o ymdrechion mewngofnodi wedi methu, rhowch gynnig arall arni mewn %minutes% munud.
